typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	modifiedAfter as timestamp,
	modifiedBefore as timestamp
}
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerDataDeltaSource
source(output(
		CountryId as integer,
		IsoCountryName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Country',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetCountry
source(output(
		LocationId as integer,
		LocationCity as string,
		LocationState as string,
		CountryId as integer,
		LocationZip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Location',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> TargetLocation
CustomerDataDeltaSource aggregate(groupBy(CustomerKey),
	PostalCode = last(PostalCode),
		CountryRegion = last(CountryRegion),
		StateProvince = last(StateProvince),
		City = last(City),
		Customer = last(Customer),
		CustomerId = last(CustomerId)) ~> Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource
Deduplicated1CustomerDataDeltaSource select(mapColumn(
		PostalCode,
		CountryRegion,
		StateProvince,
		City,
		Customer,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> CustomerData
CustomerData select(mapColumn(
		PostalCodeAlias = PostalCode,
		StateProvinceAlias = StateProvince,
		CityAlias = City,
		CountryRegionAlias = CountryRegion,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated = CustomerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCustomerData
TargetCountry aggregate(groupBy(CountryId),
	IsoCountryName = last(IsoCountryName)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetCountry
Deduplicated1TargetCountry select(mapColumn(
		CountryIdLookupFunction = CountryId,
		IsoCountryNameAlias = IsoCountryName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectCountry
SelectCustomerData, SelectCountry join(CountryRegionAlias === IsoCountryNameAlias,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForCountryIdLookupFunction
JoinForCountryIdLookupFunction select(mapColumn(
		PostalCodeAlias,
		StateProvinceAlias,
		CityAlias,
		CountryRegionAlias,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated,
		CountryIdLookupFunction
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectForCountryIdLookupFunction
TargetLocation aggregate(groupBy(LocationId),
	LocationCity = last(LocationCity),
		CountryId = last(CountryId),
		LocationZip = last(LocationZip),
		LocationState = last(LocationState)) ~> Deduplicated1TargetLocation
Deduplicated1TargetLocation select(mapColumn(
		LocationId,
		LocationZipAlias = LocationZip,
		LocationStateAlias = LocationState,
		LocationCityAlias = LocationCity,
		CountryIdAlias = CountryId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectLocation
SelectForCountryIdLookupFunction, SelectLocation join(PostalCodeAlias === LocationZipAlias
	&& StateProvinceAlias === LocationStateAlias
	&& CityAlias === LocationCityAlias
	&& CountryIdLookupFunction === CountryIdAlias,
	joinType:'left',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinForLocationId
JoinForLocationId select(mapColumn(
		PostalCodeAlias,
		StateProvinceAlias,
		CityAlias,
		CountryRegionAlias,
		CustomerId,
		CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated,
		LocationId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectForLocationId
SelectForLocationId select(mapColumn(
		LocationId,
		CustomerKey = CustomerId,
		CustomerId = CustomerData_CustomerKey_Generated
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Customer
Customer sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'Customer',
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> CustomerSink
